description: {"blocks":[{"key":"d7ivh","text":"Please note that while this protocol is for TNA extraction using the Perkin Elmer Chemagic 360, RNA extraction with resuspended solids from this protocol has been verified to perform well using the Kingfisher MagMax kit as another high throughput, automated option and two manual Qiagen kits - the All Prep Powerviral DNA/RNA Kit and the Qiamp Viral RNA Mini Kit.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":363},{"style":"bold","offset":154,"length":209}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":140,"length":13}],"data":{}},{"key":"d8hnk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"23r02","text":"This process instruction describes the steps for purification of nucleic acids from wastewater solids and preparation for downstream quantitative analysis with Reverse Transcriptase droplet digital Polymerase Chain Reaction (RT-ddPCR). Due to the large quantities of substances that have inhibitory effects on PCR in wastewater samples, a subsequent PCR inhibitor removal step is required after nucleic acid purification. Both steps of the process are carried out in a 96-well plate format. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4uj1c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"44bok","text":"This method uses the resuspended solids generated using this protocol: High Throughput pre-analytical processing of wastewater settled solids for SARS-CoV-2 RNA analyses.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":71,"length":98}],"data":{}},{"key":"22pbb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f7ti3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"21jpd","text":"RNA purification is carried out using a kit optimized for the purification of viral on for the Perkin Elmer Chemagic 360. Although only RNA is used in the downstream applications from this protocol, DNA is also eluted in this process. A crucial component of the purification kit are the magnetic particles coated with poly vinyl alcohol (M-PVA Magnetic Beads) which have a hydrophilic surface giving them an affinity for nucleic acids but not many other biological molecules. The workflow involves binding nucleic acids in a sample to the beads which are then transferred through a series of wash buffers to remove debris with a robotic head with magnetic rods.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"asum4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"865a3","text":"The OneStep PCR Inhibitor Removal Kits are PCR inhibitor clean up kits that contain all the components needed for efficient removal of contaminants that can inhibit downstream enzymatic reactions (e.g. PCR and RT) from DNA and RNA preparations. The column matrices in these PCR inhibitor clean up kits have been specifically designed for the efficient removal of polyphenolic compounds, humic/fulvic acids, tannins, melanin, etc. from the most impure DNA and RNA preparations.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4k4ac","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"astj1","text":"This process instruction applies to extraction of RNA from wastewater samples using the Chemagic™ Viral DNA/RNA 300 Kit H96 for the Perkin Elmer Chemagic 360 followed by PCR Inhibitor Removal with the Zymo OneStep-96 PCR Inhibitor Removal Kit.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"7CA1379955FC11ECBD990A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/high-throughput-pre-analytical-processing-of-waste-b2kmqcu6"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"A1BB8BB0A2C211EB9A68E97F79A08128","url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/high-throughput-pre-analytical-processing-of-waste-b2kmqcu6"}}}}

steps.section: Preparation
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fssb6","text":"If necessary, dissolve lyophilized Proteinase K in  of nuclease free water and resuspend Poly A following manufacturer directions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":51,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6r1fl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7pnja","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"46hms","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"11","error":false,"guid":"D298CC4097C611EBBC959189267D61C6","id":"87544","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"","data":{"id":893925,"mol_weight":0,"name":"Chemagic Viral DNA/RNA 300 Kit H96","linfor":"","url":"","sku":"CMG-1033-S","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"6848879097E911EB8B46457DA7FBB98C","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":198,"name":"Perkin Elmer","link":"http://www.perkinelmer.com/","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}}}}}}

steps.section: Preparation
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"eoip5","text":"Label one 50 mL conical tube as Lysis buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bm1jc","text":"Label a deep-well-plate as “Sample Plate”. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"33svb","text":"If the Chemagic 360 has not been used within 24 hours, run the protocol “Check Manifolds All.che” to prime the buffer manifolds.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3vvve","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5am6n","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"7a8a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1p605","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"dlv05","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3ok7j","text":".che files are protocols for the Chemagic 360 instrument and are available from Perkin Elmer. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"equipment","mutability":"","data":{"id":2939,"brand":"Perkin Elmer","can_edit":0,"guid":"0E973A1097C711EBBC959189267D61C6","link":null,"name":"Chemagic 360","sku":"2024-0020","specifications":null,"type":"Nucleic Acid Extractor","vendor":{"id":198,"name":"Perkin Elmer","link":"http://www.perkinelmer.com/","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}},"file":null,"image":null}}}}

steps.section: Preparation
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1krg8","text":"Elution Plates and Magbead Plates are generated in batches as needed with   Elution Buffer and   Magbeads per well. This can be done using a liquid handler such as the Agilent Bravo.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":74,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":95,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"1eboi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"60","error":false,"guid":"2C57CDD097C711EBBC959189267D61C6","id":"87545","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"150","error":false,"guid":"417BA370A24F11EB87ADF78C810C4DDF","id":"87546","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

steps.section: Preparation
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"u9am","text":"If there is condensation on the seal of the prepared Elution Plate, briefly spin the plate to collect the buffer in the bottom of the well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"25ssh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preparation
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3l9r","text":"With the plate sealed, resuspend the magnetic beads in the prepared Magbead Plate by shaking in the BioShake XP at   for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":115,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":121,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8l5n2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"","data":{"duration":0,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"75A4E8F0A24F11EB87ADF78C810C4DDF","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"1350","start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"6707C290A24F11EB87ADF78C810C4DDF","id":"79095","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

steps.section: Preparation
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4qtm0","text":"Check that the Viral RNA Buffers are connected to the Chemagic tubing. If not, perform a normal cleaning procedure, switch to Viral RNA Buffers and prime the system.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction with the Chemagic 360 Process Steps
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9ll97","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"48b5","text":"Using a wide orifice 1000 µL pipette tip, transfer   per well of homogenized sample (prepared as specified in High Throughput pre-analytical processing of wastewater settled solids for SARS-CoV-2 RNA analyses) to each well of the Sample Plate as follows: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":51,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":110,"length":98}],"data":[]},{"key":"7p98n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"300","error":false,"guid":"621802D097CE11EB8B46457DA7FBB98C","id":"87547","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"BC4CD880A2C211EB9A68E97F79A08128","url":"http://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.btyqnpvw"}}}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction with the Chemagic 360 Process Steps
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8rtk6","text":"Add   of DNA/RNA shield stock solution with BCoV spike-in from pre-analytical processing to one well of the Sample Plate to serve as an extraction positive control.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"dtrsq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"300","error":false,"guid":"5FC5AE6097CE11EB8B46457DA7FBB98C","id":"87548","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction with the Chemagic 360 Process Steps
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5u5ih","text":"Using a wide orifice tip, add the samples one at a time to ensure that a full   is pulled up and no clumps prevent the aspiration of the sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":78,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"9uo3p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"300","error":false,"guid":"5B5E0E8097CE11EB8B46457DA7FBB98C","id":"87549","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction with the Chemagic 360 Process Steps
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"d0r9b","text":"Using normal pipette tips:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2urbo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"11gbt","text":"Add   of water to the indicated wells in the figure below to create extraction negative controls.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8nstl","text":"Add   of gRNA SARS-CoV-2 control (at a concentration of 50 cp/µl) to the indicated wells to represent the positive extraction control. Add   Poly A in wells with gRNA only.
